name: Clash Cup Turbo [BETA]
description:
This exclusive beta of Clash Cup Turbo includes the core Local Multiplayer game experience as well as the first iteration of the Single Player Training, and Cup Mode.

ATTN: We are currently at MAGFest! After we're done we will be updating Clash Cup Turbo to the latest version, which will include an ONLINE MULTIPLAYER TEST! If you buy this now, you will have access to that and all future updates automatically! 

Beta Features

  • Local Multiplayer (2-4)
  • Single Player 
  • 18 Unique Stages
  • 8 Playable Characters
  • 3 Game Modes (Regulation, Elimination, Multipuck)
  • Basic CPU AI Characters

What's NOT in the Beta

  • Online Multiplayer (Friend Play)
  • Timed Multiplayer
  • Final CPU AI + Difficulty Modes
  • Achievements/Steam Cards

Note: Content is not final and subject to change. Additional features and content will be in the final version 1.0.

Gameplay

The core experience of Clash Cup Turbo is 2-4 players smacking around a speeding puck while boosting their special game changing “turbo” moves in an attempt to break down their opponents defenses and score a goal. These matches occur in a wide variety of stylized levels filled with obstacles and traps. This unique manner of competitive action was inspired by classic local multiplayer games like Windjammers and San Rio Smash ball that had simple, accessible, and deeply satisfying mechanics. We’ve found over the last few years of demoing the game that equating the gameplay to “air hockey meets smash brothers and breakout” to be the best analogy.

Story

Clash Cup is the most popular sport in the known universe. The high octane action and simple objective of the game makes for a sport that attracts the fiercest, most courageous (and strangest) competitors in the universe. Fans of Clash Cup regard it not just as sport, but an experience unlike any other. Its circuit is the universe itself, and its only rule is to win at any cost.

This purchase provides access to the latest beta version of Clash Cup Turbo as well as FULL ACCESS to the final version of Clash Cup Turbo when it releases later this year, for a 33% discount!
